description:
**IT ALWAYS HELPS TO MESSAGE ME BEFORE YOU INSTANT BOOK, TO GUARANTEE A SUCCESSFUL BOOKING**

Cozy and clean apartment in the best location in Greenpoint

Both beds are queen size
High Ceilings!
name: Boutique Apt in the heart of Greenpoint <3
review: The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
